          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Öva prognos för totalpopulation</string>
            <string language="en">Exercize forecast for total population</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Üben Sie Prognose für Gesamtbevölkerung aus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercez la prévision pour la population totale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercize a previsão para a população total</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Eserciti la previsione per popolazione totale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξασκήστε την πρόβλεψη για το συνολικό πληθυσμό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ejerza el pronóstico para la población total</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Interaktiv fylla-i-övning om att beräkna totalpopulationens åsikt efter en stickprovsundersökning.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive fylla-i - exercise about calculating the total population's opinion after one stickprovsundersökning.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Matematik B</string>
            <string language="sv">statistik</string>
            <string language="sv">övning</string>
            <string language="en">Mathematics B</string>
            <string language="en">statistic</string>
            <string language="en">exercise </string>
          </keyword>

            <source>structureValues</source>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktives fylla-i - trainieren Sie über die 
Berechnung der GesamtMeinung der bevölkerung nach 
stickprovsundersökning einer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fylla-i interactif - exercez-vous au sujet de 
calculer l'opinion de la population totale après on 
stickprovsundersökning.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fylla-i interativo - exercite sobre o cálculo da
opinião da população total após uma que stickprovsundersökning.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fylla-i interattivo - esercitisi circa la 
calcolazione dell'opinione della popolazione totale dopo una che 
stickprovsundersökning.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό φυλλα-ι - άσκηση για τον υπολογισμό της 
άποψης του συνολικού πληθυσμού μετά από το ένα poy.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fylla-i interactivo - ejercite sobre calcular la 
opinión de la población total después de una 
stickprovsundersökning.</string>
